fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Deal a Basic attack to a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every time you attack, your attack ability will increase by a tier afterwards.
- You lose the boost if you dont attack in a night.
- Boosts the power of a move by 20% for each previous, consecutive turn it has been used successfully, up to a maximum increase of 100%. (This means nothing)
